member.name: M:JsonFx.Json.JsonWriter.IsIgnored(System.Type,System.Reflection.MemberInfo,System.Object)
member.summary: Determines if the property or field should not be serialized.
member.remarks: Checks these in order, if any returns true then this is true: - is flagged with the JsonIgnoreAttribute property - has a JsonSpecifiedProperty which returns false

member.name: M:JsonFx.Json.JsonWriter.EnsureValidIdentifier(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Verifies is a valid EcmaScript variable expression.

member.name: M:JsonFx.Json.JsonWriter.EnsureValidIdentifier(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Verifies is a valid EcmaScript variable expression.
member.remarks:
http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/files/ECMA-ST/Ecma-262.pdf
IdentifierName = IdentifierStart | IdentifierName IdentifierPart IdentifierStart = Letter | '$' | '_' IdentifierPart = IdentifierStart | Digit

member.summary: Gets and sets if should conform strictly to JSON spec.
member.remarks: Setting to true causes NaN, Infinity, -Infinity to serialize as null.

member.name: P:JsonFx.Json.JsonReader.AllowNullValueTypes
member.summary: Gets and sets if ValueTypes can accept values of null
member.remarks: Only affects deserialization: if a ValueType is assigned the value of null, it will receive the value default(TheType). Setting this to false, throws an exception if null is specified for a ValueType member.

member.summary: Gets and sets if ValueTypes can accept values of null
member.remarks: Only affects deserialization: if a ValueType is assigned the value of null, it will receive the value default(TheType). Setting this to false, throws an exception if null is specified for a ValueType member.
